title: Apple announces its 2025 Pride Collection
description: Macworld Each year, Apple celebrates LGBTQ Pride Month (June) with a collection of wallpapers and an exclusive Apple Watch face and band, and 2025 is no different. The company has just announced the 2025 Pride Collection: A new Pride Harmony watch face and wallpapers will be available in watchOS 11.5, iOS 18.5, and iPadOS 18.5. We expect that release within the next week or two. The Pride Edition Sport Band is available starting today from Apple.com, and costs $49. Apple says the band features “a tapestry of rainbow stripes that vary in shape and size” so no two bands are exactly alike. Read our Best Apple Watch guide for the latest recommendations, tips, and deals.
byline: Author: Jason Cross, Senior Editor, Macworld
excerpt: In June, Apple celebrates Pride month with wallpapers, watch faces, and watch bands.

Image: Apple

Each year, Apple celebrates LGBTQ Pride Month (June) with a collection of wallpapers and an exclusive Apple Watch face and band, and 2025 is no different.

The company has just announced the 2025 Pride Collection: A new Pride Harmony watch face and wallpapers will be available in watchOS 11.5, iOS 18.5, and iPadOS 18.5. We expect that release within the next week or two.

The Pride Edition Sport Band is available starting today from Apple.com, and costs $49. Apple says the band features “a tapestry of rainbow stripes that vary in shape and size” so no two bands are exactly alike.

Read our Best Apple Watch guide for the latest recommendations, tips, and deals.
